TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FlushIntention extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether commands in the graphics stack are terminated (flushed) immediately or executed as soon as possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention Flush = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the stack of all graphics operations is flushed immediately.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FlushIntention Sync = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that all graphics operations on the stack are executed as soon as possible. This synchronizes the graphics state.
